name: Chiringuito Madness
description:
Welcome to Chiringuito Madness our submission to the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2!

You will play as a waiter in a very popular chiringuito (a beach restaurant). There will be tons of new customers as time passes. You have to be quick and remember all the customers' orders if you want to earn some money! If they get angry at you for too long, they will be gone and also their money, after 5 tables are gone, you lose the game.

Controls:

- WASD: Move

 - E: Interact with dishes/cook

 - LMB: Interact with tables

 - R: Restart

Have fun and thank you for playing our game!

Credits:
